definition: gap in coverage/gap in protection or defenses/neglected or overlooked area/dead end
dead person/(coll.) to die/(of a death) to happen
to fall ill and die/to die of illness
sudden death (in medicine, sporting competitions etc)
to knock down and kill sb with a car/to run over sb/to run sb down

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人謝拉的兒子約巴接續他作王。

sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.
sentences.chinese: 他各人文科學和教給到死，死在仲心靈。

sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.
sentences.chinese: 他各人文科學和教給到死，死在仲心靈。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而乾的樹枝，都是因樹死而凋落下來的。
我很氣，叫了他一聲“死納粹”。

sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她們如同寡婦被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: Isak Borg: But, this patient is dead.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這個病人已經死了。

sentences.english: If they are dead, they ought to be buried.
sentences.chinese: 如果它們已經死了，那就得被埋葬。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港無線電視演員容美玲被發現死在家裏昨天。

sentences.english: Let life be beautiful like summer of flowers and death like autumn leaves.
sentences.chinese: 使生如夏花之絢爛，死如秋葉之精美。

sentences.english: I think it, you are such scum should die.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得吧，你這樣的敗類應該去死。

sentences.english: He died on the way to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 後來他還是死在了去醫院的路上。

sentences.english: After class, I always review lessons and sing some chants.
sentences.chinese: 死啊課後，我總會複習課文然後唱一些頌歌。

sentences.english: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它不會傳染或寄居於死的或乾的植體組織。

sentences.english: In the difficult times， many people died of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 在那限難時世，許多人因飢餓而死。

definition: to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to fall ill and die/to die of illness
to say definitely/to commit (to a proposition)
